description:
Rarely do feet get all the glory, which is why these moisture-wicking ski socks are loaded with details that make them fit and feel the best. Using strategic cushioning and thinner, more breathable panels on top of the foot to reduce uncomfortable bunching and pressure. The payoff? Superior grip, better tech, and more control as you hunt for the next powder stash.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • Performance fit guarantees a snug, blister-resistant experience that keeps you connected and comfortable in your boots, run after run
  • All-season performers, these midweight socks naturally adapt to keep your feet at the right temperature
  • Over-the-calf socks typically cover the leg to just below the knee
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Function X Midweight with Cushion OTC Socks - Women's
